Author: CeslieLondon
Text: I appreciate the kind words ❤️ wishing I had a friend like you in real life. Stay strong

Author: clementinenancy
Text: love, everyone feels even just a little guilty around the holidays, with or without an ed. it’s a shame, as it’s just food. don’t feel terrible, holiday food is pretty damn hard to avoid. just know that everyone with an ed is going through the same shit. so many people understand you. im trying to let myself go a little and it’s going alright. i’m just reassuring myself that we’re going into a whole new decade; not a new year; a decade soon, and we after all are the ones who decide how we live. you’re in control, keep going as strong as you can xx
